0.1.name: wordpress/resume-extended
0.1.description:
Create a resume easily, and allow employers to view it on your blog.

Current Features

  • Save as a Page on your Wordpress Blog
  • Resume Sections
    • Skills
    • Employment History
      • Projects
    • Education
    • Awards & Honors

Planned Features

  • Edit and Maintain previously created resumes
  • Privacy controls
  • Resume sections:
    • Publications
    • Projects (DONE: v0.2)
    • References
  • Export to:
    • PDF (PLANNED: v0.3)
    • Microsoft Word .doc and .docx
    • Text
    • enhanced XHTML (PLANNED: v0.3)
    • XML Resume Library (PLANNED: v0.3)
  • Import from:
    • PDF
    • Microsoft Word .doc and .docx
    • Text
    • hResume
      • this includes LinkedIn
    • XML Resume Library (PLANNED
